original_text: If thy children have sinned against him, and he have cast them away for their transgression;
korean_text: 네 자녀들이 주께 죄를 지었으므로 주께서 그들을 그 죄에 버려두셨나니

sentences.original_text: If thy children have sinned against him
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너의 자녀들이 그에게 죄를 지었다면

sentences.original_text: and he have cast them away
